backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister with access control, invite code handling, user profiles (including country), RSVPs, and check‑ins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old user profiles to new ones by adding a country field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend source files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind setup defining theme variables and light/dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app into the root container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, profile setup, pairing flow, relationship status gating, and paired navigation.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button wired to Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper providing header, footer, identity-aware pairing badge, and toaster notifications.
frontend/src/features/checkins/CheckInCo: UI component for composing and submitting a check-in, handling emoji selection, message input, premium limits, and success states.
frontend/src/features/checkins/constants: Defines available emoji options and maximum message length for check-ins.
frontend/src/features/checkins/TodayStat: Displays today's check-in status for the user and partner, including latest entries and loading states.
frontend/src/features/checkins/useCheckI: React Query hook fetching historical check-ins with a limit parameter.
frontend/src/features/checkins/useSubmit: Mutation hook for submitting a check-in and invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/features/checkins/useTodayC: React Query hook retrieving today's check-ins from the backend.
Static list of country codes and names with a helper to look up countries by code.
frontend/src/features/country/CountriesM: Interactive map and dropdown component for selecting a country by clicking or searching.
frontend/src/features/country/worldMapPa: Simplified SVG path data for countries used to render an interactive world map selector.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/CheckInH: Renders a list of past check-ins with user/partner labels, dates, and loading or empty states.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Dashboar: Renders the main dashboard with daily check-in UI, status display, streaks, and tabs for today's check-in and history.
frontend/src/features/emotionalmap/Emoti: Shows an emotional comparison between partners based on today's check-ins, handling loading, pairing status, and emoji-based mood display.
frontend/src/features/pairing/PairingCar: Provides UI to generate an invite code or join a partner using a code, with copy, input, and mutation handling states.
frontend/src/features/pairing/useDisconn: Mutation hook that disconnects the current partner and invalidates all pairing-related queries.
frontend/src/features/pairing/useInviteT: Generates and stores an invite token using a mutation, exposing loading and error states.
frontend/src/features/pairing/useJoinWit: Mutation hook to join a partner using a token and invalidate related profile and pairing queries.
frontend/src/features/pairing/usePairing: Fetches partner principal and profile to determine pairing status and partner name.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileSet: Dialog for initial profile setup allowing users to enter name and country before saving.
frontend/src/features/profile/useGetCall: Query hook retrieving the current user's profile with loading state tied to actor availability.
frontend/src/features/profile/useHasPrem: Query hook checking whether the current user has a premium subscription.
frontend/src/features/profile/useSaveCal: Mutation to save the caller’s profile and invalidate the current profile query.
frontend/src/features/relationshipStatus: UI for choosing a relationship status, triggering a save mutation and calling a completion callback.
Fetches relationship status and user profile to determine chooser permissions and current status state.
Mutation hook to update relationship status with permission checks and query invalidation.
frontend/src/features/settings/SettingsV: Renders settings UI allowing users to edit their country and disconnect from a partner with confirmation dialogs and profile mutations.
frontend/src/features/streak/StreakSecti: Displays the shared streak count with a pulse animation when it increases, hiding content if unpaired or loading.
frontend/src/features/streak/useSharedSt: Provides a React Query hook to fetch the shared streak from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when changed.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating queries are organized within feature directories.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles, CSS variables for themes, and global styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/checkInHelpers.ts: Utility to get the most recent check‑in for a specific author from a list.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, typography, and component settings.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s versioned state, architectural plans, known issues, and existing feature definitions for a relationship check‑in app using Firebase.
